title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs begs judge for mercy ahead of sentencing
description: In a letter to the judge, Combs apologised and said he had been reformed after 13 months in jail.
content:
Convicted rap mogul Sean "Diddy" Combs has written a letter to the judge overseeing his criminal trial, asking for leniency during his sentencing on Friday and blaming his past behaviour on drug addiction.
In the four-page letter, he apologises "for ... [3028 chars]

title: Send costs will rise by billions without reforms, ministers told
description: The Institute for Fiscal Studies says more than 200,000 extra children will need Send support by 2029.
content:
Supporting children with special educational needs and disabilities (Send) in England will cost the government an extra £3bn a year by 2029 if the system is not reformed, a think tank has warned.
The government is already spending £12bn this year on ... [2957 chars]

content:

title: Trump news at a glance: President hails shutdown as ‘opportunity’ to further campaign of cuts
description: The government has already announced the cancellation of billions of dollars in federal funding for projects tied to Democrats. Key US politics stories from Thursday 2 October at a glance
content:
As the US government shutdown stretched into its second day, Donald Trump on Thursday hailed the funding lapse as an “unprecedented opportunity” to further his campaign of firing federal workers and downsizing departments.
